New Records: Nikola Jokic posted his fourth straight triple-double, marking his 136th career triple-double, moving within three triple-doubles of tying Magic Johnson for third place on the all-time triple-doubles list.
Key Match Events: Nikola Jokic recorded a triple-double with 37 points, 18 rebounds, and 15 assists in the game against the Dallas Mavericks.
The Denver Nuggets beat the Dallas Mavericks 122-120.
Post-Match Reflections: Nuggets head coach Michael Malone joked about Jokic's position in the MVP race, saying 'I assume after tonight’s performance he’ll probably be 5th in the MVP voting.'
Michael Porter Jr. commented on Jokic's consistent performance and his dedication to taking care of his body off the court.
